23U.F.summary: Bushveld Minerals Limited operates as an integrated vanadium producer in South Africa. The company engages in vanadium mining and processing, and iron ore exploration activities. Its projects include Mokopane Vanadium Project and the Brits Vanadium Project. The company is also developing and promoting vanadium in the global energy storage market through the application of vanadium redox flow batteries. In addition, it holds Imaloto coal project and extension that covers 11 concession blocks in the Imaloto coal basin; and engages in power generation and property ownership business. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

ARI.JO.summary: African Rainbow Minerals Limited operates as a diversified mining and minerals company in South Africa, Malaysia, Europe, the Americas, and the Far and Middle East. The company explores for precious metals, base metals, ferrous metals, and alloys, which include platinum group metals, nickel, coal, iron ore, manganese ore, and ferromanganese. It operates Two Rivers Mine, Modikwa Mine, Nkomati Mine, Black Rock Mine, Beeshoek Mine, Khumani Mine, and Goedgevonden Coal Mine. The company was incorporated in 1933 and is based in Sandton, South Africa.

BAU.JO.summary: Bauba Resources Limited engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in South Africa. It holds interest in the Bauba platinum project comprising eight properties covering an area of approximately 14,390 hectares located in the eastern limb of the Bushveld Igneous Complex; and the Bauba chrome project on the farm Moeijelijk 412KS in the Limpopo province. The company was formerly known as Bauba Platinum Limited and changed its name to Bauba Resources Limited in July 2019. Bauba Resources Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa. Bauba Resources Limited is a subsidiary of Highland Trading Investments Limited.

BMN.L.summary: Bushveld Minerals Limited operates as an integrated vanadium producer in South Africa. The company engages in vanadium mining and processing, and iron ore exploration activities. Its projects include Mokopane Vanadium Project and the Brits Vanadium Project. The company is also developing and promoting vanadium in the global energy storage market through the application of vanadium redox flow batteries. In addition, it holds Imaloto coal project and extension that covers 11 concession blocks in the Imaloto coal basin; and engages in power generation and property ownership business. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

BSHVF.summary: Bushveld Minerals Limited operates as an integrated vanadium producer in South Africa. The company engages in vanadium mining and processing, and iron ore exploration activities. Its projects include Mokopane Vanadium Project and the Brits Vanadium Project. The company is also developing and promoting vanadium in the global energy storage market through the application of vanadium redox flow batteries. In addition, it holds Imaloto coal project and extension that covers 11 concession blocks in the Imaloto coal basin; and engages in power generation and property ownership business. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

CMO.JO.summary: Chrometco Limited, a mineral exploration company, engages in the exploration and mining of mineral properties. It primarily focuses on chrome, platinum, copper, cobalt, nickel, and manganese ores, as well as other base metals. The company has chrome and platinum prospects and operations in the North West province of South Africa. Chrometco Limited is based in Johannesburg, South Africa. Chrometco Limited is a subsidiary of Sail Holdings Pty Ltd.

MRF.JO.summary: Merafe Resources Limited engages in the mining and beneficiation of chrome ore into ferrochrome. It primarily serves stainless steel mills in Africa, the Middle East, the United States, other Asia countries, and Europe. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bryanston, South Africa.

RZT.F.summary: Merafe Resources Limited engages in the mining and beneficiation of chrome ore into ferrochrome. It primarily serves stainless steel mills in Africa, the Middle East, the United States, other Asia countries, and Europe. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bryanston, South Africa.

WEZ.JO.summary: Wesizwe Platinum Limited, through its subsidiaries, explores for and evaluates mineral properties in South Africa. The company primarily explores for platinum, palladium, rhodium, and gold deposits. Its flagship project is the Bakubung platinum mine located on the Western limb of the Bushveld Igneous Complex in the North West province of South Africa. Wesizwe Platinum Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
